title: About Me
description: I am a Front-End Web Developer from Bandung, Indonesia. I have over five years of experience building web applications with JavaScript frameworks like Next.js, React.js, and Angular. I enjoy creating fast, responsive, and user-friendly websites, and working with teams to deliver great results.
